name: Sonk: Goofquest [DEMO]
description:
chili dogs.

A (very) short game demo inspired by Skoopity's funni Sonk animations.

The demo includes a level of "Cyber Hill Zone" inspired by Frontiers, with the aim to showcase different mechanics such as loops, wallwalking, rails, and attacking. It's not perfect as Sonic physics in GDevelop proves to be hard and only a few can replicate it.

More levels based on Skoopity's animation might be made soon depending on the feedback on the game.

Special thanks to Chaise for helping me with the game!

https://www.youtube.com/c/DLTVyt
